item.title: Save Hook
item.description: Running lsp-format-buffer and lsp-organize-imports are two functions that youâ€™ll want to run so often they should be save hooks. These not only format your code and organize your imports, imports are automatically added and removed as necessary. Use the before-save-hook, (add-hook 'before-save-hook 'enielson-before-save-hook) (defun enielson-before-save-hook () (when (string-match ".go\\'" buffer-file-name) (lsp-format-buffer) (lsp-organize-imports)))

item.title: Shortcuts
item.description: Table 1: Go Keys Keys Function Description , t t run current test , t p run all tests in file , t g f generate tests for exported functions , t g F generate tests for all functions SPC p a switch between file and test file , r r lsp-rename Renames object , h h godoc-at-point K evil-smart-doc-lookup, seems to call godoc-at-point in go-mode
